newsitem.title: USA: Novell says fiscal Q2 on track.
newsitem.headline: Novell says fiscal Q2 on track.

text.p: Novell Inc President and Chief Operating Officer Joe Marengi said the company's business so far in its second fiscal second quarter ending in April is on track.

"All I can say is we're on track at this point in our quarter," Marengi told Reuters in an interview in connection with the naming of Sun Microsystems Inc Chief Technology Officer Eric Schmidt to the position of chairman and CEO of Novell.
Wall Street analysts expect Novell to earn $0.17 a share in its second fiscal quarter, according to the mean estimate in a First Call survey of financial analysts.

Earlier, shares of Novell rose by 1-1/16 to 9-5/8 by early afternoon in Nasdaq trade on optimism over the naming of Schmidt -- considered one of the prime architects of Sun's Internet strategy, including its Java programming language -- to head the Provo, Utah network software maker. ((sam.perry@reuters.com, Palo Alto Bureau 415 846 5400))
